messages.title: Our plan for Britain
messages.content: Many Brighton residents are switching to back the Liberal Democrats because they’re the only party with a plan for our country. The Liberal Democrats are fighting against a hard Brexit. Whilst the Conservatives sound like UKIP and Labour fight amongst themselves.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are fighting against a hard Brexit and will keep the UK in the single market.
The Liberal Democrats will give the public, not just MPs, their say on the final Brexit deal.

issues.brexitEurope: The Liberal Democrats are fighting against a hard Brexit. We will fight to keep the UK in the single market. We will give the public, not just MPs, their say on the final deal.
issues.economy: The Conservatives will take Britain out of the single market whatever the cost, putting the economy at risk.

quotes.text: "We say: yes to the Single Market."
"What I am proposing cannot mean membership of the single market."

images.caption: The Liberal Democrats are the only party united in fighting a hard Brexit. Join us.

examples: The Liberal Democrats are the only party with a plan for our country.
The Conservative will take Britain out of the single market whatever the cost, putting the economy at risk.
Many Brighton residents are switching to back the Liberal Democrats because they’re the only party with a plan for our country.
The Liberal Democrats are fighting against a hard Brexit.
The Conservative will take Britain out of the single market whatever the cost, putting the economy at risk.
The Conservatives will take Britain out of the single market whatever the cost, putting the economy at risk.
Whilst the Conservatives sound like UKIP and Labour fight amongst themselves.
"What I am proposing cannot mean membership of the single market." - Theresa May, January 2017
